----
text/plain
value [0-1]
  number [0-1]

{"foo":2}
----
text/plain
value [0-9]
  object [0-9]
    keyValue [1-8]
      key [1-6]
      value [7-8]
        number [7-8]

[12,11,13]
----
text/plain
value [0-10]
  array [0-10]
    value [1-3]
      number [1-3]
    value [4-6]
      number [4-6]
    value [7-9]
      number [7-9]

{"foo":2,"bar":3,"baz":[5,6,7]}

    keyValue [1-8]
      key [1-6]
      value [7-8]

        number [15-16]

value [0-0]

{
  "foo": [
    1,
    2,
    3
  ],
  "bar": {"baz": 5, "boop": null}
}
